snippet.title: Mages of Mystralia - Reveal teaser
snippet.description:
Get Mages of Mystralia on your favorite platform: http://game.magesofmystralia.com/buy/

ESRB Rating: EVERYONE 10+ with Fantasy Violence

Mages of Mystralia is an innovative action-adventure game that boasts a unique spell creation system which provides an infinite number of possibilities for combat tactics and puzzle solving.

Join our newsletter! http://www.magesofmystralia.com/
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/Mystralia
Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/magesofmystralia/

http://www.borealysgames.com/
https://www.facebook.com/borealysgames/
https://twitter.com/borealysgames
